Text: Any ideas why it says cannot render file? Wont work on mpc or vlc player...shame, anyways...boooo!

Works fine on VLC player and also SMPlayer. Just make sure your PC has all the codecs installed.

Install the K-Lite combined community pack or Ffdshow.  If there is a render error, it has something to do with either Directx or your graphics card is not configured properly.
